step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting in a comfortable position! Keep your hands on your abdomen for the next step.
Good start with hand placement. Remember to inhale slowly through your nose.
You're doing well with the inhale and muscle tightening. Focus on keeping your elbows and wrists more relaxed during this phase.
Nice exhale and relaxation! Try to keep your elbows and wrists a bit steadier as you relax.
Excellent start for the second repetition! You're maintaining good posture and hand placement.
Good job on the inhale. Remember to keep your whole body muscles tight as you breathe in.
You're doing great with the muscle tightening during the inhale. Focus on keeping your elbows and wrists more stable.
Well done relaxing and exhaling! Aim for a bit more stability in your elbows and wrists as you release the tension.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to keep your whole body muscles tight as you inhale and relax them as you exhale. Focus on keeping your elbows and wrists steady throughout.
